mapper.select: SELECT TBL3."shinsakaiIinCode" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinCode , TBL3."shinsakaiIinKaishiYMD" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinKaishiYMD , TBL3."shinsakaiIinShuryoYMD" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinShuryoYMD , TBL3."shinsakaiIinShimei" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinShimei , TBL3."shinsakaiIinKanaShimei" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinKanaShimei , TBL3."seibetsu" AS TBL3_seibetsu , TBL3."shinsakaiIinShikakuCode" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinShikakuCode , TBL3."shinsainYusoKubun" AS TBL3_shinsainYusoKubun , TBL3."tantoChikuCode" AS TBL3_tantoChikuCode , TBL3."yubinNo" AS TBL3_yubinNo , TBL3."Jusho" AS TBL3_Jusho , TBL3."telNo" AS TBL3_telNo , TBL3."faxNo" AS TBL3_faxNo , TBL3."seinengappiYMD" AS TBL3_seinengappiYMD , TBL3."biko" AS TBL3_biko , TBL3."haishiFlag" AS TBL3_haishiFlag , TBL3."haishiYMD" AS TBL3_haishiYMD , TBL4."remban" AS TBL4_remban , TBL4."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AS TBL4_shoKisaiHokenshaNo , TBL4."shujiiIryokikanCode" AS TBL4_shujiiIryokikanCode , TBL4."shujiiCode" AS TBL4_shujiiCode , TBL4."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" AS TBL4_ninteichosaItakusakiCode , TBL4."ninteiChosainNo" AS TBL4_ninteiChosainNo , TBL4."sonotaKikanCode" AS TBL4_sonotaKikanCode , TBL5."shichosonCode" AS TBL5_shichosonCode , TBL2."jogaiTaishoShinsakaiIinCode" AS TBL2_jogaiTaishoShinsakaiIinCode FROM rgdb."DbT5594ShinsakaiIinJoho" AS TBL3 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5590ShinsakaiIinJogaiJoho" AS TBL2 ON TBL2."jogaiTaishoShinsakaiIinCode" = TBL3."shinsakaiIinCode" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho" AS TBL1 ON TBL1."zenkaiShinseishoKanriNo" = TBL2."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5595KaigoNinteiShinsakaiIinShozokuKikanJoho" AS TBL4 ON TBL2."jogaiTaishoShinsakaiIinCode" = TBL4."shinsakaiIinCode" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"AS TBL5 ON TBL5."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = TBL4."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE TBL1."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{shinseishoKanriNo}

SELECT TBL3."shinsakaiIinCode" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinCode , TBL3."shinsakaiIinKaishiYMD" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinKaishiYMD , TBL3."shinsakaiIinShuryoYMD" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinShuryoYMD , TBL3."shinsakaiIinShimei" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinShimei , TBL3."shinsakaiIinKanaShimei" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinKanaShimei , TBL3."seibetsu" AS TBL3_seibetsu , TBL3."shinsakaiIinShikakuCode" AS TBL3_shinsakaiIinShikakuCode , TBL3."shinsainYusoKubun" AS TBL3_shinsainYusoKubun , TBL3."tantoChikuCode" AS TBL3_tantoChikuCode , TBL3."yubinNo" AS TBL3_yubinNo , TBL3."Jusho" AS TBL3_Jusho , TBL3."telNo" AS TBL3_telNo , TBL3."faxNo" AS TBL3_faxNo , TBL3."seinengappiYMD" AS TBL3_seinengappiYMD , TBL3."biko" AS TBL3_biko , TBL3."haishiFlag" AS TBL3_haishiFlag , TBL3."haishiYMD" AS TBL3_haishiYMD , TBL4."remban" AS TBL4_remban , TBL4."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AS TBL4_shoKisaiHokenshaNo , TBL4."shujiiIryokikanCode" AS TBL4_shujiiIryokikanCode , TBL4."shujiiCode" AS TBL4_shujiiCode , TBL4."ninteichosaItakusakiCode" AS TBL4_ninteichosaItakusakiCode , TBL4."ninteiChosainNo" AS TBL4_ninteiChosainNo , TBL4."sonotaKikanCode" AS TBL4_sonotaKikanCode , TBL5."shichosonCode" AS TBL5_shichosonCode FROM rgdb."DbT5594ShinsakaiIinJoho" AS TBL3 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5595KaigoNinteiShinsakaiIinShozokuKikanJoho" AS TBL4 ON TBL3."shinsakaiIinCode" = TBL4."shinsakaiIinCode" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster"AS TBL5 ON TBL5."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = TBL4."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE TBL3."shinsakaiIinCode" = #{shinsakaiIinCode}
